Package org.javalite.activeweb.controller_filters

Class ControllerFilterAdapter

java.lang.Object
org.javalite.activeweb.controller_filters.ControllerFilterAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerFilter
public class ControllerFilterAdapter extends Object implements ControllerFilter
This is a convenience class for filters to extend. It provides no-op methods already implemented from ControllerFilter.
Author:
Igor Polevoy
